productos.descripcion: The FFT igv Agility 3t is an omnidirectional automated guided vehicle (AGV) with a payload of up to 3 tons.
The FFT igv Agility 10t is an omnidirectional AGV with a payload of up to 10 tons. Market launch planned for 2025 (in development).
The FFT igv Elevate 1t is a bidirectional AGV with an integrated scissor lift table and a payload of up to 1 ton.
The FFT igv MOVY 1t is a bidirectional AGV with a payload of up to 1 ton and the new platform for the next AGV family. Market launch planned for 2025 (in development).
The FFT igv MOVY 2t is a bidirectional AGV with a payload of up to 2 tons and the new platform for the next AGV family. Market launch planned for 2026 (in development).
